task.title: View node performance activity
task.shortdesc: You can view performance activity for each node in a graphical format. This information provides real-time statistics for CPU and read/write I/O operations per second (IOPS) for each drive the node. The utilization graph is updated every five seconds, and the drive statistics graph updates every ten seconds.

step.cmd: Click Actions for the node you want to view.

info.note: You can see specific points in time on the line and bar graphs by positioning your cursor over the line or bar.
